content.question: Which of the following most accurately explains the performance of the Communist Party in the 2018 election?

choices.label: The Communist Party is clearly the most powerful and popular party in Russia due to its history.
The second-place finish of the Communist Party demonstrates the party’s continued support from the people.
Putin threatened to dissolve the Communist Party shortly before the election because of its alleged corruption and violence.
The Communist Party was supported mostly by the upper class and the military, as evidenced by their strong showing.

content.answer: The second-place finish of the Communist Party demonstrates the party’s continued support from the people.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
